net.minecraft.resource
Provides resources to Minecraft, including resource access, provision, and reloading.

    Modifier and Type
    Interface
    Description
    interface 
    LifecycledResourceManager
    A lifecycled resource manager is available until it is closed.
    interface 
    ResourceManager
    Provides resource loading capabilities to Minecraft.

    LifecycledResourceManagerImpl
    A basic implementation of resource manager with a lifecycle.
    class 
    NamespaceResourceManager
    A resource manager that only loads resources for a specific namespace.
    class 
    ReloadableResourceManagerImpl
    A reloadable resource manager is always available to be accessed, and is the type used by the minecraft client instance.
